citations.narrative:
An exposed nail, and a nail with a sharp section of wood were noted at the base of the “cow jumping over the moon”
structure within the sheep and goat enclosure. The nail and piece of wood are attached to a metal band that was intended
to hold wooden slats to an old cylindrical structure. The band was lying on the ground no longer attached to the structure
allowing the animals to potentially become entangled or otherwise injured on the sharp points. Outdoor housing facilities
shall be structurally sound and shall be maintained in good repair to protect the animals from injury.
Correct by 7/25/23
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.125(a) 
   
Facilities, general. 
An exposed nail, and a nail with a sharp section of wood were noted at the base of the “cow jumping over the moon” 
structure within the sheep and goat enclosure. The nail and piece of wood are attached to a metal band that was intended 
to hold wooden slats to an old cylindrical structure. The band was lying on the ground no longer attached to the structure 
allowing the animals to potentially become entangled or otherwise injured on the sharp points. Outdoor housing facilities 
shall be structurally sound and shall be maintained in good repair to protect the animals from injury. 
Correct by 7/25/23 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
 n
